hero.title: Token Launch Platform
hero.subtitle: Create, discuss, and launch tokens on Axiome blockchain. From idea to launch — with AI assistant and community support.

about.title: What is Launch Suite?
about.description: Launch Suite is a platform for preparing and launching tokens on Axiome. We've created a unique system where tokens first exist as projects within the platform, and only after preparation are launched on the blockchain.
about.highlight: This allows the community to discuss, evaluate, and provide feedback before the token even appears on the network.

create.title: Create a Project
create.description: Describe your idea or use the AI assistant to generate tokenomics, descriptions, and launch plan. The token is created as a project within the platform.

community.title: Gather Feedback
community.description: The community sees your project in Explorer. Get comments, reactions, and advice before launch. Improve your project based on feedback.

launch.title: Launch on Blockchain
launch.description: When ready — launch your token on Axiome blockchain via Token Lab. All information from the platform is automatically imported.

studio.title: AI Token Studio
studio.description: AI assistant helps create everything you need: name, description, tokenomics, FAQ, and even social media posts. Don't know where to start? Just describe your idea.

explorer.title: Token Explorer
explorer.description: Explore all tokens on Axiome. Check trust scores, risk flags, community activity. Find promising projects before they take off.

ownership.title: Ownership & Editing
ownership.description: Created a token? Verify ownership by linking your wallet and get full control over the project page. Add logo, links, update description.

community.title: Community
community.description: Comment on projects, add reactions, follow updates. The community helps filter quality projects from scams.

token.title: $LAUNCH Token
token.subtitle: Ecosystem Token
token.description: The native token of Axiome Launch Suite ecosystem. $LAUNCH holders get exclusive benefits and share in the success of all projects launched through our platform.

features.support: Priority assistance: tech specs, landing pages, marketing
features.revenue: Revenue share from all new projects

token.revenueDescription: Every project launched through Axiome Launch Suite generates fees. $LAUNCH holders receive a share of these fees proportional to their holdings.

cta.title: Ready to Launch?
cta.subtitle: Create a token project in minutes. AI helps with content, community — with feedback.

explorer.title: Token Explorer
explorer.subtitle: Discover tokens on Axiome. Check ratings, activity, and risk flags.
explorer.search: Search by name, ticker, or address...
explorer.noResults: No tokens found matching your search.

studio.title: Token Studio
studio.subtitle: Describe your token idea and let AI generate everything you need to launch.

form.title: Tell us about your token
form.description: Fill in the details and our AI will generate descriptions, tokenomics, and more.
form.ideaPlaceholder: Describe what your token does, what problem it solves, or what makes it unique...
form.audiencePlaceholder: e.g., DeFi users, NFT collectors, gamers...
form.utilitiesPlaceholder: What can holders do with your token? Staking, governance, discounts...

createToken.title: Ready to create your token?
createToken.subtitle: Create your token directly on Axiome blockchain using your wallet.

receive.title: Receive Tokens
receive.instruction: Share this address or scan the QR code to receive tokens
receive.warning: Only send AXM and CW20 tokens to this address

connect.title: Connect Your Wallet
connect.description: Connect your Axiome wallet to view your balance, send tokens, and manage your assets.

swap.title: Swap Tokens
swap.comingSoonDesc: Token swapping will be available soon. You'll be able to exchange AXM for any token directly in your wallet.

createToken.name: Token Name
createToken.enableMintHelp: Allow creating more tokens in the future
createToken.feeDescription: Creating a token requires a small network fee (~0.01 AXM).

validation.supplyPositive: Supply must be a positive number

token.noRiskFlags: No risk flags detected. This token appears safe.
token.disclaimer: This is not financial advice. Always do your own research before investing.
token.youAreOwner: You are the owner of this token

claimOwnership.title: Is this your token?
claimOwnership.description: If you are the creator of this token, you can get access to edit information, add logo, social links and more.
claimOwnership.step2Desc: Verify ownership via micro-transaction from wallet
claimOwnership.step3Desc: Edit description, add logo and links

ownerPanel.title: Token Management
ownerPanel.subtitle: You are the owner of this token

footer.disclaimer: Not financial advice. DYOR before investing in any token.

benefits.createTokens: Create and manage your own tokens
benefits.commentReact: Comment and react to token projects

launchpad.title: Launchpad
launchpad.subtitle: Discover all tokens on Axiome. Find new projects, verified tokens, and track trends.
launchpad.beFirst: Be the first to create a token project!

create.savedAsDraft: Your token has been saved as a draft. You can edit it anytime from your dashboard.
